storyInfo: Facing the brutal Brassrust Knight, Maria tries her best to level the playing field, but gets a scolding along with an injury. Elsewhere, the Armorless Union seems to be making a move.

attributes.content: Maria.
Maria, you are gifted with a pair of pegasian eyes.
Maria. Stand. Come, come forth.
Ugh?!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Haa... haah...! You dodged it!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Very well, I’ll let you keep your right hand for just a little longer... Just a little longer.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: (—These aren’t tears... It’s sticky... Is it blood?)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (...So much blood...)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (My heart’s beating way too fast... I...)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Pathetic. The way you swing your weapon is no better than those clowns knocking at the knightly orders' doors. It’s laughable.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Aside from your looks, you are nothing like the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: I... I’m not going to lose!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Good, now I want to tear your face off even more, you naive noble prick!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Ingra! He’s chasing her like a storm!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This is the most destructive match the Roar Arena has seen this event—! The Butcher of the Field! 'Brassrust' Ingra!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Just last month, at the season’s first event, poor 'Foehn' got absolutely decimated when the 'Brassrust' kept pummeling him until all of his limbs were crushed!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: You heard that right! He pummeled with his bare hands! That’s definitely not the kind of thing you’d expect a knight carrying a giant axe to do!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: All eyes are on Maria Nearl here at the Roar Arena today, but is this also where we see her meet a bloody fate? Let us know what you in the audience think!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Just like that! 'Brassrust' Ingra! Smear the battlefield with your opponent’s blood!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Haaahh... haaahhh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (Everything feels so heavy—)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria! Just forfeit!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It’s one match! There are other chances to score the points you need—!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria—!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Auntie Zofia... What are you talking about?
I can’t hear you... I feel dizzy... My shield feels so heavy...
What am I... doing... The knight competitions... In the arena...
I need to... open my eyes!
Haa... haah...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hah! Not a bad counter—That really gives me all the more reason to tear you apart!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: But it’ll be no fun if we end this so quickly. I’ll smear your blood all over that irritating face... the Radiant Knight’s face!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: We both know... you’re at your limit too.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hah! A little blood’s not going to stop me!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Maria!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Well... I didn’t expect Ingra to join the fray so soon...
The National Council let him go early. Hmph, it’s like the whole trial was just a sham.
Looks like the corporation coughed up quite a bit of money for him.
Uh huh... the Rose Paper Union’s full of money anyway.
It really pisses me off. They’re raking in money manipulating public opinion, and other unscrupulous means. That commentator even dared to talk about it openly in a public event.
That just says they aren’t afraid.
Yeah, I mean, what do they have to be afraid of?
Well, they have us to be afraid of. Ingra’s a bad loser, and I’ll absolutely destroy him.
Come on, didn’t we agree to let me fight him?
Before that... If the young Nearl doesn’t come up with an idea soon, she won’t make it out of this in one piece.
—Her blood is still in her body! Maria Nearl is much more stubborn than any of us could’ve thought!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What are you waiting for? Doesn’t a knight like her just tear at your heartstrings?! Don’t forget! Thanks to the generosity of the good-hearted souls at Roar Guards Company, this season’s commission fee is just half the normal rate!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: —Hold on! Something’s happening here!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The two of them are at a standoff, but Maria’s laid down her shield! What is happening here?! Is she hoping to take on Ingra’s giant axe with that fragile sword of hers?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: There’s an enormous difference in both size and power!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I can’t emphasize this enough—! Commission’s half off! Isn’t this act of courage worth a few dozen gold coins?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Hahh... haahh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Not bad, kid... A faint light envelops your blade. Is this your last gasp?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Ha, excellent! I’ll rip your arms out, and gag you with your own flesh—
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: I must win... I must...
What am I doing... Are you meant to kill your opponent in the knight sports?
I don’t need my shield... I can’t block his axe...
He’s hurt too, but he doesn’t care... He’s like a monster, and he enjoys killing...
How should I... face an enemy like him... An enemy? Isn’t he a knight?
A knight...?
'To be a knight is to be the noble light that illuminates the land...'
Ahh—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: O-Owww...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Came around finally?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Auntie...? What... happened...? Oh.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Do you remember now?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Did I lose?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But Ingra passed out too. Neither of your scores changed at all.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I-I see. Phew... That’s good—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: It’s not good! You’re hurt!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You should’ve forfeited the match, going up against an opponent like that! It’s just a single match! There are so many ways for us to get those points back!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If you just want to get a title and keep your family’s nobility, there’s no reason to go that far—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I... I never thought about forfeiting, not even once.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Do you have any idea how lucky you are to get out of a fight against Ingra in one piece?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If you get hurt again, what good does getting into the Major do to you?!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...He’s really strong, but...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: He’s not like the other knights. He comes from an insanely well-off family, and he’s only in the competition to hurt people. He lives for it. That’s the kind of man Olmer Ingra is.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria, if you get hurt like this again, I won’t let you fight anymore.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Listen to me!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: F-Fine...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Don’t move so much. Get some rest.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: That match ended in a draw, but you’ll have more and more companies trying to woo you... Marcin and I will turn them down for now. Try to rest up and get better.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Oh... What’s that sword?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...That’s the sword I used to carry. I dug it out while you were training the other day.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But why are you carrying that sword specifically...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (Even though Zofia’s already...)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: No reason at all.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But if something bad happens to you because of him, I’ll kill him personally, even if it means I’ll have to face the National Council.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Y-You’re way overthinking it...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Can I see it? It kinda looks like it hasn’t been used in a while.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: No. Get some rest.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I might start to rust if I lie in bed all day...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: No dice.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Please, Zofia! Auntie! I won’t ask for anything else! I’ll be good and rest up!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: *Sigh*... You’re becoming more and more like your sister...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Take it. Don’t you do anything weird with it. I’m quite fond of it.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Eh... This is pretty dusty...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That’s the proof that I treasure it!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Where are you two going, carrying all that stuff with you?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: We’re going to pay Maria a visit.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I will never forgive Ingra for doing that to our girl...
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Spare her the noise and give her some peace and quiet. Zofia will take care of Maria.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Well, I can’t just sit around and do nothing! Did you see that last swing Ingra took at her? What happens if that comes back to haunt her?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: We’ve got an old knight and an old craftsman here. There’s bound to be something we can do to help.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: What if you run into Młynar instead? Do you think he won’t throw you two out the door?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...That prick wouldn’t dare do that to us when his old man was still around, and I know when to run if it comes to it!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...Hmm, the moment the two of them left, I got a new customer. They just might be the albatross around my neck.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Welcome. It’s been a while since we've had such a beauty in here. What can I get you?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ...This one has a pretty name. Let’s go with this one, the 'Thorn Tear.'
attributes.name: Platinum
